Class PoiWorkbook.PoiHssfWorkbook

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.meja.model.AbstractWorkbook<PoiSheet,PoiRow,PoiCell>
com.dua3.meja.model.poi.PoiWorkbook
com.dua3.meja.model.poi.PoiWorkbook.PoiHssfWorkbook
All Implemented Interfaces:
Workbook, AutoCloseable, Iterable<Sheet>
Enclosing class:
PoiWorkbook
public static class PoiWorkbook.PoiHssfWorkbook extends PoiWorkbook
Concrete implementation of PoiWorkbook for HSSF-workbooks (the old Excel format).
